title: MarvinInternalLLM
description: Schema describing configuration and capabilities for the SyzygySys research & diagnostics agent Marvin.

id.description: Canonical identifier for this Marvin deployment (e.g., marvin-core, marvin-labs).

version.description: Semantic version of the Marvin build being deployed.

provider.description: Model provider or runtime (Anthropic, OpenAI, Local/Ollama, etc.).

name.description: Model name or family (e.g., claude-sonnet-4.1, syz-marvin-finetune).

parameters.description: Model invocation parameters (temperature, max_tokens, top_p, etc.).

interfaces.description: List of transport interfaces Marvin exposes.

endpoint.description: Connection string or URI for the interface.

authentication.description: Reference to the auth mechanism (service account, API key secret, etc.).

research.description: Allow Marvin to perform open research and synthesis.

code_generation.description: Allow Marvin to generate or modify code artifacts.

diagnostics.description: Allow Marvin to run SDF/StateGuard diagnostics.

deployment.description: Allow Marvin to trigger deploy workflows when EHI and policy gates pass.

safety.description: Safety rails and governance settings for Marvin.

hilt.description: Require explicit human-in-the-loop approvals for moderated actions.

allowed_domains.description: Whitelist of knowledge or system domains Marvin can operate within.

sdf.description: SDF pipeline identifier for diagnostics reporting.

ledger.description: ACE::LEDGER stream where actions and reasoning artifacts are recorded.

observability_tags.description: Labels applied to observability events for filtering/search.
